info.description: Semantria applies Text and Sentiment Analysis to tweets, facebook posts, surveys, reviews or enterprise content.
info.title: Semantria

delete.description: This method removes certain blacklisted items by their values on Semantria side.

parameters.description: Identifier of configuration blacklist items linked to.
parameters.name: config_id

parameters.description: List of unique blacklisted items (strings).
parameters.name: Blacklisted items

200.description: No response was specified

202.description: Client request accepted and configurations updated.

400.description: Incoming request body is incorrect. Server responds with details.

402.description: Unauthorized. Limit of system calls is reached or subscription is expired.

403.description: Forbidden. Server responds if client tries to remove primary configuration.

500.description: Server side issue. Server may respond with the details in response body.

get.description: This method retrieves all backlisted items available on Semantria side.

parameters.description: Identifier of configuration blacklist linked to.
parameters.name: config_id

200.description: Client request accepted and queued. Server responds with the blacklist.

202.description: Client request accepted, no blacklist found. Server responds with empty body.

402.description: Unauthorized. Limit of system calls is reached or subscription is expired.

500.description: Server side issue. Server may respond with the details in response body.

post.description: This method adds new unique items to the backlist on Semantria side.

parameters.description: Identifier of configuration blacklist linked to.
parameters.name: config_id

parameters.description: List of parametrized JSON or XML objects.
parameters.name: Blacklisted items

200.description: No response was specified

202.description: Client request accepted and configurations updated.

400.description: Incoming request body is incorrect. Server responds with details.

402.description: Unauthorized. Limit of system calls is reached or subscription is expired.

406.description: Number of allowed blacklisted items per configuration achieved.

500.description: Server side issue. Server may respond with the details in response body.

delete.description: This method removes certain user categories by their names on Semantria side.

parameters.description: Identifier of configuration user categories linked to.
parameters.name: config_id

parameters.description: List of user category names (strings).
parameters.name: Category names

200.description: No response was specified

202.description: Client request accepted and configurations updated.

400.description: Incoming request body is incorrect. Server responds with details.

402.description: Unauthorized. Limit of system calls is reached or subscription is expired.

403.description: Forbidden. Server responds if client tries to remove primary configuration.

500.description: Server side issue. Server may respond with the details in response body.

get.description: This method retrieves list of user categories available on Semantria side.

parameters.description: Identifier of configuration user categories linked to.
parameters.name: config_id

200.description: Client request accepted and queued. Server responds with the categories list.

202.description: Client request accepted, no categories found. Server responds with empty body.

402.description: Unauthorized. Limit of system calls is reached or subscription is expired.

500.description: Server side issue. Server may respond with the details in response body.

post.description: This method adds or updates user categories by unique names on Semantria side.

parameters.description: Identifier of configuration user categories linked to.
parameters.name: config_id

parameters.description: List of parametrized JSON or XML objects.
parameters.name: Categories

200.description: No response was specified

202.description: Client request accepted and configurations updated.

400.description: Incoming request body is incorrect. Server responds with details.

402.description: Unauthorized. Limit of system calls is reached or subscription is expired.

406.description: Number of allowed categories per configuration or samples per category achieved.

500.description: Server side issue. Server may respond with the details in response body.

post.description: This method queues collection of documents onto the server for analysis. Queued collection of documents analyzes in common context as entire thing. If unique configuration ID provided, Semantria uses settings of that configuration during analysis, in opposite the primary configuration uses. Collection IDs are unique in scope of configuration. If the same ID appears twice, Semantria overrides existing collection with the new Data

parameters.description: Identifier of configuration used for analysis.
parameters.name: config_id

parameters.description: Parametrized JSON or XML object.
parameters.name: Collection

200.description: Client request accepted and queued. Server responds with the sentiment-bearing phrases list.

202.description: Client request accepted and queued for processing.

402.description: Unauthorized. Limit of system calls is reached or subscription is expired.

406.description: Documents limit per collection is achieved.

413.description: Characters limit for single document exceeded.

500.description: Server side issue. Server may respond with the details in response body.

get.description: This method retrieves analysis results for processed collections from Semantria. FAILED collections will have FAILED status in response. Semantria responds with limited amount of results per API call. If configuration ID provided, Semantria responds with the collections, which were queued using the same configuration ID, in opposite Primary configuration uses.

parameters.description: Identifier of configuration used for analysis.
parameters.name: config_id

200.description: Client request accepted and queued. Server responds with processed collections.

202.description: Client request accepted, no processed collections found on the server.

402.description: Unauthorized. Limit of system calls is reached or subscription is expired.

500.description: Server side issue. Server may respond with the details in response body.

delete.description: This method cancels collection analysis by unique ID on Semantria side if it is waiting for analysis in queue.

parameters.description: Identifier of configuration used for analysis.
parameters.name: config_id

parameters.description: Collection ID
parameters.name: collection_id

200.description: Client request accepted. Document canceled from processing on the server.

402.description: Unauthorized. Limit of system calls is reached or subscription is expired.

404.description: No collections with provided ID found on server.

500.description: Server side issue. Server may respond with the details in response body.

get.description: This method retrieves analysis results for documents collection by its unique ID or the collection’s status in queue if it did not analyzed yet. Semantria guarantees delivering of all collections back to the client even if they FAILED on Semantria side due to some reason.

parameters.description: Identifier of configuration used for analysis.
parameters.name: config_id

parameters.description: Collection ID
parameters.name: collection_id

200.description: Client request accepted. Server responds with processed document or its status.

402.description: Unauthorized. Limit of system calls is reached or subscription is expired.

404.description: No collections with provided ID found on server.

500.description: Server side issue. Server may respond with the details in response body.

get.summary: Retrieve collection analysis or its status in queue

delete.description: This method removes certain configuration by unique ID on Semantria side.

parameters.description: List of configuration identifiers (strings).
parameters.name: Configuration IDs

200.description: No response was specified

202.description: Client request accepted and configurations updated.

400.description: Incoming request body is incorrect. Server responds with details.

402.description: Unauthorized. Limit of system calls is reached or subscription is expired.

403.description: Forbidden. Server responds if client tries to remove primary configuration.

500.description: Server side issue. Server may respond with the details in response body.

get.description: This method retrieves all user configurations available on Semantria side.

200.description: Client request accepted. Server responds with status object.

402.description: Unauthorized. Limit of system calls is reached or subscription is expired.

500.description: Server side issue. Server may respond with the details in response body.

post.description: This method creates or updates specific configurations on Semantria side. If unique ID of configuration provided, Semantria updates certain configuration is exists. If unique ID not passed, Semantria creates new configuration with provided settings.

parameters.description: List of parametrized JSON or XML objects.
parameters.name: Configurations

200.description: No response was specified

202.description: Client request accepted and configurations updated.

400.description: Incoming request body is incorrect. Server responds with details.

402.description: Unauthorized. Limit of system calls is reached or subscription is expired.

406.description: Number of allowed configurations for user subscription is reached.

500.description: Server side issue. Server may respond with the details in response body.

post.description: This method queues document onto the server for analysis. Queued document analyzes individually and will have its own set of results. If unique configuration ID provided, Semantria uses settings of that configuration during analysis, in opposite the primary configuration uses. Document IDs are unique in scope of configuration. If the same ID appears twice, Semantria overrides existing document with the new Data.

parameters.description: Identifier of configuration used for analysis.
parameters.name: config_id

parameters.description: Parametrized JSON or XML object.
parameters.name: Document

200.description: Client request accepted and queued. Server responds with the sentiment-bearing phrases list.

202.description: Client request accepted and queued for processing.

402.description: Unauthorized. Limit of system calls is reached or subscription is expired.

413.description: Characters limit for the document exceeded.

500.description: Server side issue. Server may respond with the details in response body.

post.description: This method queues batch of documents for analysis. The rules are the same as for single document mode but here the documents ordered into the batch.

parameters.description: Identifier of configuration used for analysis.
parameters.name: config_id

parameters.description: List of parametrized JSON or XML objects.
parameters.name: Batch of Documents

200.description: Client request accepted and queued. Server responds with the sentiment-bearing phrases list.

202.description: Client request accepted and queued for processing.

402.description: Unauthorized. Limit of system calls is reached or subscription is expired.

403.description: Request is forbidden for selected processing mode.

406.description: Documents limit per batch is achieved.

413.description: Characters limit for the document exceeded.

500.description: Server side issue. Server may respond with the details in response body.

post.summary: Queue batch of documents for analysis

get.description: This method retrieves analysis results for processed documents from Semantria. FAILED documents will have FAILED status in response. Semantria responds with limited amount of results per API call. If configuration ID provided, Semantria responds with the document, which were queued using the same configuration ID, in opposite Primary.

parameters.description: Identifier of configuration used for analysis.
parameters.name: config_id

200.description: Client request accepted and queued. Server responds with processed documents.

202.description: Client request accepted, no processed documents found on the server.

402.description: Unauthorized. Limit of system calls is reached or subscription is expired.

500.description: Server side issue. Server may respond with the details in response body.

delete.description: This method cancels document analysis by unique ID on Semantria side if it is waiting for analysis in queue.

parameters.description: Identifier of configuration used for analysis.
parameters.name: config_id

parameters.description: Document ID
parameters.name: document_id

200.description: Client request accepted. Document canceled from processing on the server.

402.description: Unauthorized. Limit of system calls is reached or subscription is expired.

404.description: No documents with provided ID found on server.

500.description: Server side issue. Server may respond with the details in response body.

get.description: This method retrieves analysis results for the single document by its unique ID or the document’s status in queue if it did not analyzed yet. Semantria guarantees delivering of all documents back to the client even if they FAILED on Semantria side due to some reason.

parameters.description: Identifier of configuration used for analysis.
parameters.name: config_id

parameters.description: Document ID
parameters.name: document_id

200.description: Client request accepted. Server responds with processed document or its status.

402.description: Unauthorized. Limit of system calls is reached or subscription is expired.

404.description: No documents with provided ID found on server.

500.description: Server side issue. Server may respond with the details in response body.

get.summary: Retrieve document analysis or its status in queue

get.description: This method retrieves overall and per configuration usage statistics for specific timeframe. Statistics ordered per available configurations. Available interval values are current hour, day, week, month and year.

parameters.description: Configuration identifier for usage statistics retrieving.
parameters.name: config_id

parameters.description: Hour, Day, Week, Month, Year values are supported.
parameters.name: interval

200.description: Client request accepted. Server responds with statistics details.

402.description: Unauthorized. Limit of system calls is reached or subscription is expired.

500.description: Server side issue. Server may respond with the details in response body.

get.description: This method retrieves API status information such as the app version, current API version, supported languages and encodings, the overall service status, etc.

200.description: Client request accepted. Server responds with status object.

402.description: Unauthorized. Limit of system calls is reached or subscription is expired.

500.description: Server side issue. Server may respond with the details in response body.

get.description: This method retrieves user's subscription details that consist of the list of allowed features, configured limits and options on Semantria side.

200.description: Client request accepted and queued. Server responds with subscription details.

402.description: Unauthorized. Limit of system calls is reached or subscription is expired.

500.description: Server side issue. Server may respond with the details in response body.

count.description: The count of occurrences of the attribute across the documents

mentions.description: Returns genuine forms of attribute mentioned across the documents

categories.description: List of sub-categories of the current category if applicable

sentiment_polarity.description: Verbal representation of sentiment score. Can be "negative", "positive" or "neutral"

sentiment_score.description: The sentiment score associated with this category

strength_score.description: Strength of the category matches with the document content

title.description: The category title, which is its label in the text

type.description: Type of category; can be either "node" (root level) or "leaf" (nested) value

documents.description: List of documents text that need to be analyzed by the service

id.description: Up to 32 symbols unique identifier of document assigned and tracked by client

job_id.description: Specific marker of incoming job that can be used then for collections retrieving

tag.description: Any text of up to 50 characters used like marker

config_id.description: Unique configuration identifier. Usually 36 alphanumeric characters

entities.description: Returns the named entities and user defined entities from the text

facets.description: Returns the facets extracted across all documents in the collection

id.description: Unique collection identifier. Can be up to 36 alphanumeric characters

job_id.description: Specific marker of a job collection belongs to, can be used for collections ordering on client side.

tag.description: Any text of up to 50 characters used like marker

topics.description: Returns the concept and query defined topics determined for the text

auto_response.description: Defines whether or not the service should respond with processed results automatically. Default: false

callback.description: Defines a callback URL for automatic data responding

categories_threshold.description: Defines low threshold for strength score of user categories to be reported in the output. Default: 0.45

chars_threshold.description: Defines the threshold for alphanumeric characters in the text in percent. Default: 80

collection.description: Includes options related to collection processing mode

document.description: Includes options related to document processing mode

entities_threshold.description: Defines low threshold for evidence score of named and user entities to be reported in the output.

from_template_config_id.description: Unique identifier of configuration (template) the current configuration has been clonned from

is_primary.description: Identifies whether the current configuration is primary or not. Default: false

language.description: Defines target language that will be used for task processing. Default: English

modified.description: The timestamp of the latest update of the record. Creation date of update didn't occur

one_sentence.description: Leads the service to consider the entire document as single sentence. Default: false

process_html.description: Leads the service to clean HTML tags before processing. Default: false

version.description: Version of the vertical pack, for versioning purposes

attribute_mentions_limit.description: Limits the number of mentions of attribute responded from the server. Default: 0

concept_topics_limit.description: Limits the number of concept topics responded from the service. Default: 5

facet_atts_limit.description: Limits the number of facets which will be responded from the server. Default: 5

facet_mentions_limit.description: Limits the number of mentions of facet responded from the server. Default: 0

facets_limit.description: Limits the number of facets which will be responded from the server.  Default: 15

named_entities_limit.description: Limits the number of named entities responded from the service. Default: 5

named_mentions_limit.description: Limits the number of mentions of theme responded from the server. Default: 0

query_topics_limit.description: Limits the number of query topics responded from the service. Default: 5

theme_mentions_limit.description: Limits the number of entity mentions responded from the server. Default: 0

themes_limit.description: Limits the number of themes responded from the service. Default: 5

user_entities_limit.description: Limits the number of user entities the service responds. Default: 15

user_mentions_limit.description: Limits the number of user entity mentions the service responds. Default: 0

auto_categories_limit.description: Limits the number of auto categories the service responds. Default: 5

concept_topics_limit.description: Limits the number of concept topics the service responds. Default: 5

detect_language.description: Switches on language detection feature. Default: true

entity_themes_limit.description: Limits the number of entity themes the service responds. Default: 0

intentions.description: Switches on intentions detection feature. Default: false

model_sentiment.description: Switches on/off model-based sentiment feature. Default: false

named_entities_limit.description: Limits the number of named entities the service responds. Default: 5

named_mentions_limit.description: Limits the number of named entity related mentions. Default: 0

named_opinions_limit.description: Limits the number of named entity opinions the service responds. Default: 0

named_relations_limit.description: Limits the number of named entity relations the service responds. Default: 0

phrases_limit.description: Limits the number of responded sentiment-bearing phrases for document. Default: 0

pos_types.description: Defines parts-of-speech which will be responded by the server

possible_phrases_limit.description: Limits the number of responded possible phrases which may affect on sentiment score extraction. Default: 0

query_topics_limit.description: Limits the number of query topics the service responds. Default: 5

summary_limit.description: Limits the number of sentences for the document summary feature. Default: 3

theme_mentions_limit.description: Limits the number of document and entity related theme mentions. Default: 0

themes_limit.description: Limits the number of document themes the service responds. Default: 0

user_entities_limit.description: Limits the number of user entities the service responds. Default: 5

user_mentions_limit.description: Limits the number of user entity related mentions. Default: 0

user_opinions_limit.description: Limits the number of concept topics the service responds. Default: 0

user_relations_limit.description: Limits the number of user entity relations the service responds. Default: 0

is_imperative.description: Represents whether sentence (group of words) is imperative or not

is_polar.description: Represents whether or not sentence content contains sentiment polarity

words.description: Returns list of words grouped by the parent sentence

id.description: Up to 32 symbols unique identifier of document assigned and tracked by client.

job_id.description: Specific marker of incoming job that can be used then for documents retrieving

tag.description: Any text of up to 50 characters used like marker.

text.description: Document text that needs to be analyzed by the service.

auto_categories.description: Auto-generated categories applicable for the document

config_id.description: Unique configuration identifier. Usually 36 alphanumeric characters

details.description: Returns sentences from the original document with POS tags within

entities.description: Returns the named entities and user defined entities from the text

id.description: Unique document identifier. Can be up to 36 alphanumeric characters

intentions.description: Returns intentions list detected by the engine

job_id.description: Specific marker of a job document belongs to, can be used for documents ordering on client side

language_score.description: The percentage score of the best match of language among detected languages

model_sentiment.description: Returns details of model-based sentiment analysis for the document

opinions.description: Returns the list of opinions extracted from the source text

phrases.description: Returns sentiment-bearing phrases of the document

relations.description: Returns relations which represent a connection between one or more Entity objects

sentiment_polarity.description: Verbal representation of sentiment score. Can be "negative", "positive" or "neutral"

sentiment_score.description: A sentiment analysis of the document text

source_text.description: Original source text passed by client for this document

summary.description: A summary of the document text

topics.description: Returns the concept and query defined topics determined for the text

count.description: The count of occurrences of the entity across the documents

entity_type.description: Type of the entity (Company, Person, Place, Product, etc.)

label.description: Descriptive label for the entity, if applicable

mentions.description: Returns the genuine forms of entity mentioned across the documents

negative_count.description: The count of negative occurrences of the entity across the documents

neutral_count.description: The count of neutral occurrences of the entity across the documents

positive_count.description: The count of positive occurrences of the entity across the documents

title.description: Normalized form of the entity. It is the normalized entity title

type.description: Type of the entity; can be either “named” or “user” (reserved for future usage)

attributes.description: Returns the attributes associated with this facet

count.description: The count of occurrences of the facet in the text

mentions.description: Returns genuine forms of facet mentioned across the documents

negative_count.description: The count of negative occurrences of the facet across the documents

neutral_count.description: The count of neutral occurrences of the facet across the documents

positive_count.description: The count of positive occurrences of the facet across the documents

detailed_mode.description: Includes detailed mode output for certain language

discovery_mode.description: Includes discovery mode output for certain language

html_processing.description: Represents whether HTML processing supported for certain language or not

language.description: Represents language following options relevant to

settings.description: Includes analysis adjustment options for certain language

auto_categories.description: Represents whether auto-categories of entities supported for certain language or not

entity_mentions.description: Represents whether mentions of entities supported for certain language or not

entity_opinions.description: Represents whether opinions of entities supported for certain language or not

entity_relations.description: Represents whether relations of entities supported for certain language or not

entity_themes.description: Represents whether themes of entities supported for certain language or not

intentions.description: Represents whether intentions detection supported for certain language or not

language_detection.description: Represents whether language detection feature supported or not

model_sentiment.description: Represents whether model-based sentiment supported for certain language or not

named_entities.description: Represents whether named entities extraction supported for certain language or not

pos_tagging.description: Represents whether POS tagging supported for certain language or not

queries.description: Represents whether queries of entities supported for certain language or not

sentiment.description: Represents whether sentiment detection supported for certain language or not

sentiment_phrases.description: Represents whether sentiment phrases detection supported for certain language or not

summarization.description: Represents whether summarization supported for certain language or not

theme_mentions.description: Represents whether mentions of themes supported for certain language or not

themes.description: Represents whether themes extraction supported for certain language or not

user_categories.description: Represents whether user categories of entities supported for certain language or not

user_entities.description: Represents whether user entities extraction supported for certain language or not

entity_mentions.description: Represents whether mentions of entities supported for certain language or not

facet_attributes.description: Represents whether attributes of facets supported for certain language or not

facet_mentioins.description: Represents whether mentions of facets supported for certain language or not

facets.description: Represents whether facets detection supported for certain language or not

named_entities.description: Represents whether named entities extraction supported for certain language or not

queries.description: Represents whether queries extraction supported for certain language or not

theme_mentions.description: Represents whether mentions of themes supported for certain language or not

themes.description: Represents whether themes extraction supported for certain language or not

user_categories.description: Represents whether user categories extraction supported for certain language or not

user_entities.description: Represents whether user entities extraction supported for certain language or not

blacklist.description: Represents whether blacklist feature supported for certain language or not

queries.description: Represents whether queries definition supported for certain language or not

sentiment_phrases.description: Represents whether sentiment-bearing phrases adjustmment supported for certain language or not

user_categories.description: Represents whether user categories definition supported for certain language or not

user_entities.description: Represents whether user entities definition supported for certain language or not

config_id.description: Unique identifier of configuration associated with the vertical pack. Required for cloning

description.description: Verbal description of template features, belonging to domain area, etc.

id.description: Unique document identifier. Can be up to 36 alphanumeric characters

is_free.description: Shows whether Vertical pack is free or requires subscription

language.description: The language supported by the vertical pack

type.description: The type of the vertical pack, can be either "vertical-pack" or "language-default"

version.description: Version of the vertical pack, for versioning purposes.

evidence_phrase.description: The phrase which expressed the intention

type.description: The classification of the intention detected (buy, quit, etc.)

what.description: The object of the intention (if detected)

who.description: The author of the intention (if detected)

index.description: Document index within collection where the mention appeared

length.description: The length of the mention in bytes

offset.description: The amount of bytes offset in the original text before the start of the mention

is_negated.description: Indicates whether or not the mention has been negated

label.description: The text of the attribute mention

locations.description: List of coordinates of the mentions found within the collection

negating_phrase.description: If the mention has been negated, this gives the negating phrase

mixed_score.description: Mixed sentiment score associated with the document

model_name.description: Name of the sentiment model used for scoring

negative_score.description: Negative (probable negative score) sentiment score associated with the document

neutral_score.description: Neutral (probable neutral score) sentiment score associated with the document

positive_score.description: Positive (probable positive score) sentiment score associated with the document

sentiment_polarity.description: Verbal representation of sentiment score that matches the best on the document. Can be "negative", "positive" or "neutral"

quotation.description: The text of the expressed opinion

sentiment_polarity.description: Verbal representation of sentiment score. Can be "negative", "positive" or "neutral"

sentiment_score.description: The sentiment score associated with the opinion

speaker.description: An entity title identifying the author of the opinion

topic.description: An entity title identifying the subject of the opinion, if applicable

type.description: Type of opinion according to extracted entity

intensifying_phrase.description: If the phrase has been intensified, this gives the intensifying phrase

is_intensified.description: Specifies whether the phrase has been intensified or not

is_negated.description: Specifies whether the phrase has been negated or not

negating_phrase.description: If the phrase has been negated, this gives the negating phrase

sentiment_polarity.description: Verbal representation of sentiment score. Can be "negative", "positive" or "neutral"

sentiment_score.description: The sentiment score associated with this phrase

title.description: The text of the sentiment-bearing phrase

type.description: Type of phrase; can be either "possible" or "detected" value

confidence_score.description: A measure of confidence in the relationship extraction

entities.description: Returns entities which presents parent relationship

extra.description: Extra information that has been extracted about the relationship

relation_type.description: A label describing the nature of the relationship

type.description: Type of relation according to extracted entities

entity_type.description: Type of the entity (Company, Person, Place, Product, etc.)

title.description: Normalized entity title based on existing entity normalization rules

calls_data.description: Total number of data API calls made. These affect you API balance

calls_polling.description: Total number of polling API calls made. These do not affect API balance

calls_settings.description: Total number of settings API calls made. These do not affect API balance

colls_documents.description: Total number of documents that have been queued into collections

colls_failed.description: Total number of collections that have failed to be processed

colls_processed.description: Total numbers of collections that have been successfully processed

colls_responded.description: Total number of successfully processed collections that have been returned

docs_failed.description: Total number of documents that have failed to be processed

docs_processed.description: Total number of documents that have been successfully processed

docs_responded.description: Total number of successfully processed documents that have been returned

latest_used_app.description: The latest application that used the API on this account

overall_batches.description: Total number of queued batches of texts processed

overall_calls.description: Total number of API calls made

overall_docs.description: Total number of documents that have been queued

overall_exceeded.description: Total number of documents that have exceeded the favorable (suggested) limit

overcall_colls.description: Total numbers of collections that have been queued

status.description: Semantria subscriber status. Can be active, expired, disabled, etc

used_app.description: A list of all the applications that have used the API on this account

calls_data.description: Total number of data API calls made. These affect you API balance

calls_polling.description: Total number of polling API calls made. These do not affect API balance

calls_settings.description: Total number of settings API calls made. These do not affect API balance

colls_failed.description: Total number of collections that have failed to be processed

colls_processed.description: Total numbers of collections that have been successfully processed

colls_responded.description: Total number of successfully processed collections that have been returned

docs_failed.description: Total number of documents that have failed to be processed

docs_processed.description: Total number of documents that have been successfully processed

docs_responded.description: Total number of successfully processed documents that have been returned

latest_used_app.description: The latest application that used the API on this account

overall_batches.description: Total number of queued batches of texts processed

overall_calls.description: Total number of API calls made

overall_docs.description: Total number of documents that have been queued

overall_exceeded.description: Total number of documents that have exceeded the favorable (suggested) limit

overcall_colls.description: Total numbers of collections that have been queued

used_app.description: A list of all the applications that have used the API on this account

api_version.description: Represents current version of the exposed API

service_status.description: Represents the availability of the service

service_version.description: Represents current version of the Semantria service

supported_compression.description: Exposes supported compression algorithms. Currently only gzip and deflate are supported

supported_encoding.description: Exposes supported content encoding. Currently only UTF-8 is supported

sentiment_score.description: Strength of the category matches with the document content

title.description: The category title, which is its label in the text

type.description: Type of category; can be either "node" (root level) or "leaf" (nested) value

basic_settings.description: Includes basic settings of current subscription

billing_settings.description: Billing related settings of current subscription

feature_settings.description: Includes features related settings of current subscription

status.description: Semantria subscriber status. Can be active, expired, disabled, etc

auto_response_limit.description: Represents the maximum size of outgoing batch for auto-response feature

batch_limit.description: Represents the maximum size of the incoming batch in documents

blacklist_limit.description: Represents the maximum number of allowed blacklist items

callback_batch_limit.description: Represents the maximum size of outgoing batch for callback data retrieving mode

categories_limit.description: Represents the maximum number of allowed categories

category_samples_limit.description: Represents the maximum number of allowed category samples

characters_limit.description: Represents the maximum length of the document allowed for processing

collection_limit.description: Represents the maximum size of collection in documents

configurations_limit.description: Represents the maximum number of allowed configurations

entities_limit.description: Represents the maximum number of allowed entities

output_data_limit.description: Represent the maximum number allowed as output limit of configuration

processed_batch_limit.description: Represents the maximum size of outgoing batch for pulling data retrieving mode

queries_limit.description: Represents the maximum number of allowed queries

return_source_text.description: Indicates whether responding of source text along with the analysis data is allowed or not

sentiment_limit.description: Represents the maximum number of allowed sentiment-bearing phrases

app_seats_allocated.description: Number of allocated application cells permitted to work with the API

app_seats_permitted.description: Number of permitted application to work with the same API account

data_calls_balance.description: Represents actual value of remained data API calls

data_calls_limit.description: Represents the limit of data API calls per "data_calls_limit_interval" value

data_calls_limit_interval.description: Represents an interval for the "data_calls_limit" value of current subscription

docs_balance.description: Current transaction balance. Applicable for pay-as-you-go subscriptions only

docs_limit.description: Represents the transactions limit per "docs_limit_interval" value

docs_limit_interval.description: Represents the timeframe for the "docs_limit" value of current subscription

docs_suggested.description: Represents the amount of favorable documents suggested for throughput subscriptions

docs_suggested_interval.description: Represents the timeframe for the “docs_suggested” value of the current subscription

expiration_date.description: Expiration date of current subscription. Defined as a Unix time stamp

limit_type.description: Subscription type can have either pay-as-you-go or throughput value

polling_calls_balance.description: Represents actual value of remained polling API calls

polling_calls_limit.description: Represents the limit of polling API calls per "polling_calls_limit_interval" value

polling_calls_limit_interval.description: Represents an interval for the "polling_calls_limit" value of current subscription

priority.description: Processing priority of current subscriber. Can have low, normal or high value

settings_calls_balance.description: Represents actual value of remained settings API calls

settings_calls_limit.description: Represents the limit of settings API calls per "settings_calls_limit_interval" value

settings_calls_limit_interval.description: Represents an interval for the "settings_calls_limit" value of current subscription

collection.description: Includes collection processing mode related settings

document.description: Includes document processing mode related settings

html_processing.description: Identifies whether HTML processing feature is supported or not

supported_languages.description: Lists all languages which are allowed for current subscription

concept_topics.description: Indicates whether concept topics are allowed or not

facets.description: Indicates whether facets extraction feature is allowed or not

mentions.description: Indicates whether mentions are allowed for facets and attributes or not

named_entities.description: Indicates whether named entities feature is allowed or not

query_topics.description: Indicates whether query defined topics are allowed or not

themes.description: Indicates whether themes extraction feature is allowed or not

user_entities.description: Indicates whether user entities feature is allowed or not

auto_categories.description: Indicates whether auto categories feature is allowed or not

concept_topics.description: Indicates whether concept topics are allowed or not

entity_themes.description: Indicates whether entity themes feature is allowed or not

intentions.description: Indicates whether intentions feature is allowed or not.

language_detection.description: Indicates whether language detection feature is allowed or not

mentions.description: Indicates whether mentions for entities and themes are allowed or not

model_sentiment.description: Indicates whether model-based sentiment feature is allowed or not

named_entities.description: Indicates whether named entities feature is allowed or not

named_relations.description: Indicates whether relations for named entities are allowed or not

opinions.description: Indicates whether opinions feature is allowed or not

phrases_detection.description: Indicates whether possible phrases detection feature is allowed or not

pos_tagging.description: Indicates whether part of speech tagging feature is allowed or not

query_topics.description: Indicates whether query defined topics are allowed or not

sentiment_phrases.description: Indicates whether sentiment-bearing phrases output is allowed or not

summary.description: Indicates whether summarization feature is allowed or not

themes.description: Indicates whether document themes feature is allowed or not

user_entities.description: Indicates whether user entities feature is allowed or not

user_relations.description: Indicates whether relations for user entities are allowed or not

config_id.description: Unique identifier of configuration associated with the vertical pack. Required for cloning

description.description: Verbal description of template features, belonging to domain area, etc.

id.description: Unique document identifier. Can be up to 36 alphanumeric characters

is_free.description: Shows whether Vertical pack is free or requires subscription

language.description: The language supported by the vertical pack

type.description: The type of the vertical pack, can be either "vertical-pack" or "language-default"

version.description: Version of the vertical pack, for versioning purposes.

mentions.description: Returns the concept and query defined topics determined for the text

phrases_count.description: Count of sentiment-bearing phrases was used in calculating theme's sentiment

sentiment_polarity.description: Verbal representation of sentiment score. Can be "negative", "positive" or "neutral"

sentiment_score.description: Sentiment score for theme’s sentences across the documents

themes_count.description: Count of themes across the documents that got rolled into this one

title.description: The text of the theme across the documents

hitcount.description: The number of documents within the collection that match the topic

sentiment_polarity.description: Verbal representation of sentiment score. Can be "negative", "positive" or "neutral"

sentiment_score.description: The sentiment score for documents content associated with the topic

title.description: The topic title, which is its label in the text

topics.description: List of sub topics if exists

type.description: Type of the topic; can be either "concept" or "query"

is_negated.description: A flag indicating if the token is or is part of a sentiment inverting construction

sentiment_score.description: The sentiment score associated with the word

stemmed.description: The stemmed form of the word

title.description: The original word representation in text

type.description: Verbal representation of part of speech in addition to certain tag
